title: 2 top stock recommendations from Shilpa Rout
description: Aarti Industries has a strong support at around 495-498 zones. So wait for the dip to happen a bit more and buy around 500 and look for targets of 550 again from here. It has bounced back many times from those levels.

title: Aarti Industries shares plunge 6% on Q4 results, guidance. Further fall ahead for stock?
